item.title: US Senate Committee Releases Anti-Encryption Proposal
item.description:
US Senate Committee Releases Anti-Encryption Proposal

Over on Reddit, the Bitcoin community is not all that happy with this proposal either. Some people are questioning how government officials can be so utterly ignorant of what they are proposing. Encryption is a hot topic among digital currency enthusiasts, as it not only protects privacy but it is also a more secure method of dealing with various aspects of life.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Further Appreciation Likely
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Further Appreciation Likely

Ethereum price traded further higher, and then started consolidating gains. There is a chance of another upside move in ETH/USD moving ahead. Ethereum price traded further higher, and then started consolidating gains. There is a chance of another upside move in ETH/USD moving ahead.

item.title: SAW Inspired Bitcoin Ransomware Deletes Files Every Hour
item.description:
SAW Inspired Bitcoin Ransomware Deletes Files Every Hour

Jigsaw, a SAW movie inspired bitcoin ransomware deletes files if demands are not met. Billy the Puppet from the same movie is the face of Jigsaw. Read more... A group of online hackers is using their sense-of-humor - and an indisputable love for Saw movie series - to rob people off their Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Looking Towards the Week's Close - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Looking Towards the Week's Close - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking to trade in this morning's bitcoin price on Friday. It's been a strange week in the bitcoin price yet again. We've seen some technical patterns, some consolidation, and even - thankfully - some breakout action from which we've been able to place trades according to our intraday strategy.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; One, Two and Three! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; One, Two and Three! - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking to trade in this evening's bitcoin price on Friday. In this morning's bitcoin price watch analysis, we suggested that we would like to see three things this by afternoon. First, a successful completion of our ongoing long trade.

item.title: EDCAB Will Decide On Bitcoin and Blockchain Regulation in Europe
item.description:
EDCAB Will Decide On Bitcoin and Blockchain Regulation in Europe

The creation of EDCAB signals industry's commitment to work with policymakers over the long term to achieve positive outcomes for the sector and the European citizens it serves. There is no denying European policymakers are keeping a very close eye on the blockchain ecosystem.

item.title: Davemail, Decentralized Encrypted Communication on Git - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Davemail, Decentralized Encrypted Communication on Git - NEWSBTC

Davemail, encrypted, decentralized email protocol on git, a new way to overcome government surveillance! Anonymity and privacy are hard to come by in today's version of the Internet. The governments and its cloak and dagger machinery have been keeping a constant watch on the usage of internet, even going through the communication between people.

item.title: South African Startup to Fight Movie Piracy using Bitcoin
item.description:
South African Startup to Fight Movie Piracy using Bitcoin

It comes as little to no surprise to find out Digital Currency Group has taken an interest in this project, and were part of the company's second round seed investment. Bitcoin and digital currency offer many different use cases, although a lot of them still have to be discovered and explored.

item.title: Plutus & PlutusDEX - Complete End-To-End Decentralized Bitcoin Payments - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Plutus & PlutusDEX - Complete End-To-End Decentralized Bitcoin Payments - NEWSBTC

PlutusDEX dapp ensure complete decentralization of bitcoin-powered contactless payments through Plutus platform. Read more... Bitcoin and blockchain technology has changed the face of online end electronic payment systems. The use of blockchain technology, combined with crypto-tokens is not an alternative payment option anymore.

item.title: Explain it like I'm Five - Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Level - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Explain it like I'm Five - Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Level - NEWSBTC

The difficulty level of Bitcoin mining recently went up by over 7 percent. What is it and why is it necessary? Read more... The Bitcoin difficulty level recently increased by 7.09% recently. What is difficulty level and why is is important? Bitcoin is probably the first decentralized, distributed open source digital currency protocol to gain massive adoption.
